Title: His House
Writer: Remi Weekes (screenplay), Felicity Evans (story), Toby Venables (story)
Actors: Sope Dirisu, Wunmi Mosaku, Malaika Wakoli-Abigaba, Matt Smith
Plot: A refugee couple makes a harrowing escape from war-torn South Sudan, but then they struggle to adjust to their new life in an English town that has an evil lurking beneath the surface.
Awards: Nominated for 3 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 7 wins & 27 nominations.
